description: LCM of all divisors of d of n such that d+1 is a prime power.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
mathematica: a[n_] := LCM @@ Select[Divisors[n], PrimeNu[# + 1] == 1 &]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 85}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 17 2013 *)
